channel.title: physics.gen-ph updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: physics.gen-ph updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Where Are All The Tourists From 3025?
item.description: arXiv:2508.09157v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: This paper examines the distinct lack of clear examples of time-travellers and proposes an explanation for their absence without assuming technical barriers to constructing time machines. Instead, it develops and then analyses a model of the consequences of time-travellers; finding that time travel is self-suppressing.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Jackson

item.title: Riemann Zero Condition Off the Critical Line: A Matrix Formulation
item.description: arXiv:2411.17701v4 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We develop a finite-dimensional, symmetric matrix framework associated with the Riemann zeta function for complex arguments s with Real(s) unequal 1/2.
item.dc:creator: Chee Kian Yap
